about.title: About Baltek Jobs
about.subtitle: Connecting talented professionals with exceptional career opportunities through innovative job matching technology.
about.mission_text: To revolutionize the job search experience by creating meaningful connections between job seekers and employers, making career advancement accessible, efficient, and rewarding for everyone.
about.vision_text: To become the leading global platform where talent meets opportunity, fostering professional growth and building thriving careers across all industries and skill levels.
about.people_first_desc: Every decision we make prioritizes the success and well-being of our users.
about.innovation_desc: We continuously evolve and improve our platform to meet changing needs.

file.upload_pdf_doc: Please upload a PDF, DOC, or DOCX file
file.try_again_valid_file: Please try again with a valid file
file.drag_drop_resume: Drag and drop your resume here, or

cta.career_journey_title: Ready to Start Your Career Journey?
cta.career_journey_desc: Join thousands of professionals who have found their dream jobs through Baltek Jobs.

about_stats.technology_description: Built with cutting-edge technology, Baltek Jobs leverages advanced algorithms and machine learning to match the right talent with the right opportunities.
about_stats.excellence_desc: We strive for the highest quality in everything we do, from our platform to our support.

contact_info.response_time: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.message_placeholder: Please provide detailed information about your inquiry...
contact.description: Have questions or need support? We're here to help you succeed in your career journey.
contact.message_sent_desc: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

terms.title: Terms and Agreement
terms.acceptance_text: By accessing and using Baltek Jobs, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.info_text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, apply for jobs, or contact us.

chat_widget.start_applying_jobs: Start applying to jobs to chat with employers

profile_modal.upload_limit_description: You can only upload up to 3 resumes
profile_modal.organization_placeholder: Type organization name (select from suggestions or add new)
profile_modal.resume_upload_limit: You can upload up to 3 resumes. Delete one to upload another.

profile.upload_resume_description: Upload your resume to showcase your experience to employers and increase your chances of getting hired.

personal_info_list.personal_info: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)

privacy_content.how_we_use_intro: We use the information we collect to:

how_we_use_list.provide_services: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
how_we_use_list.process_applications: Process job applications and connect you with employers
how_we_use_list.send_notifications: Send you notifications about job opportunities
how_we_use_list.respond_questions: Respond to your comments and questions
how_we_use_list.analyze_usage: Analyze usage patterns to improve our platform

privacy_content.info_sharing_intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

info_sharing_list.with_employers: With employers when you apply for jobs (resume, application materials)
info_sharing_list.service_providers: With service providers who assist us in operating our platform
info_sharing_list.legal_requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
info_sharing_list.business_transfer: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

privacy_content.no_sell_policy: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy_content.data_security_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy_content.contact_intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

terms_content.use_license_intro: Permission is granted to temporarily access Baltek Jobs for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

use_license_list.commercial_use: use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
use_license_list.reverse_engineer: attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
use_license_list.remove_copyright: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials

terms_content.user_accounts_text: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms_content.contact_info_text: If you have any questions about these Terms and Agreement, please contact us at support@baltek.net

personal_info_step.title: Personal Information
personal_info_step.subtitle: Tell us about yourself
personal_info_step.required_note: Name fields are required - other fields are optional
